title: Essential Daredevil Vol. 2 (Trade Paperback)
description:
In celebration of his 40th anniversary, this follow-up to last year’s best-selling ESSENTIAL DAREDEVIL Vol. 1 collects some of Daredevil’s greatest moments. Struggling with his dual identity and the temporary loss of his powers, DD battles a who’s who of classic foes – including Stilt-Man, the Masked Marauder, the Beetle, Cobra, Mr. Hyde, the Trapster, the Exterminator, the Unholy Three and the Jester. 
Guest-starring Spider-Man, the Fantastic Four, Dr. Doom, Captain America & Thor!
Collects DAREDEVIL #26-48, ANNUAL #1, FANTASTIC FOUR #73
